comments.content:
The sans serif is nexa book  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/font-fabric/nexa/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317190624/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/font-fabric/nexa/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/font-fabric/nexa/")  
The scrip is good vibrations  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typesetit/good-vibrations/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317190624/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typesetit/good-vibrations/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typesetit/good-vibrations/")  
I hope you help .

You and Yours is Great Vibes, a free Google web font:  
 [http://www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Great+Vibes](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317190624/http:/www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Great+Vibes "http://www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Great+Vibes")

There is also a pro version for purchase:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typesetit/good-vibrations/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317190624/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typesetit/good-vibrations/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typesetit/good-vibrations/")

FOR | at | Hairstyling is Nexa Regular:  
 [http://fontfabric.com/nexa-font/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317190624/http:/fontfabric.com/nexa-font/ "http://fontfabric.com/nexa-font/")
